Sorry about that.  I'll check out the Ant documentation.  This is the 
first Yahoo group that I've signed up with and is my first posted 
question, so I'm new to this but I'm sure I'll learn quickly.

Thanks again.

--- In junit@y..., Jason Rogers <jacaetev@y...> wrote:
> This is something that belongs on the Ant User List, not here.  
This forum is
> for the use of JUnit...
> 
> Have you looked at the documentation that comes with Ant?
> 
> -jason
> 
> --- nancy.doherty@s... wrote:
> > I want to write my JUnit results to a file and format the output 
> > according to how I want it.  I've been successful with and want 
> > something similar to the predefined format of plain text that 
goes to 
> > a file via the "outfile" attribute of an xml file.  I do want to 
> > customize this a bit though.
> > 
> > I've read there are custom formatters that need to implement 
> > 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitResultFormatter.  
> > Can anyone provide an example or point me to a location where I 
can 
> > read up on this?
> > 
> > Thanks in advance!
> >
